projects.title: Home Page
projects.description: Involved in the new web home page which works with backend driven UI. I worked on building the web library which turns a JSON into the UI and the micro frontend responsible of displaying it.

projects.title: Subcription program
projects.description: Worked on the micro frontend of the subscription program which is available in the web and also in the apps as a webview. Being pioneers in this aspect and ensuring the quality of the product.

projects.title: Web Team
projects.description: I contribute to cross company web projects that help improve the development experience and the quality of the product we build in line with the company's OKRs and KPIs

projects.title: Real time chat
projects.description: End to end chat solution to communicate users and support agents with crm integration. I was in charge of building a solution proposal, its architecture, design and implementation. The solution consisted in two micro frontends and a micro service which used web sockets for the real time messaging.

projects.title: Voip calls
projects.description: IP calls console micro frontend for support agents and user facing real time call information frontend.

projects.title: CRM Migration
projects.description: Migration of the CRM frontend to company's new web architecture.

projects.title: Toll systems
projects.description: Development and maintenance of .NET web applications, SQL Server database administration, remote and field implementation.
